tourCancellation.title: Tour Cancellation
tourCancellation.description: Free cancellation of the tour up to 48 hours in advance

reviews.title: Reviews
reviews.description: Reviews from real people who have been on tours

prepayment.title: Prepayment
prepayment.description: We do not take full payment for our service, only a prepayment

aboutUs.title: GetTrip - Online service for finding excursions and tours
aboutUs.description: GetTrip is an innovative platform where travelers can easily find and book tours and excursions with local guides and companies. Join our dynamic community of travel enthusiasts, share your knowledge, meet interesting people, and earn while doing what you love! GetTrip helps you discover new horizons, creating unforgettable experiences for you and your guests

whoCanJoin.title: Who can become a guide?
whoCanJoin.description: We invite both professional guides and enthusiasts who know their city and are passionate about conducting tours. Join us and share your passion and knowledge to create unique and memorable excursions and tours

sendingTour.title: Sending the tour
sendingTour.description: We place special importance on a clear concept of the excursion that reflects your unique perspective on the city and the location of the excursion

call.title: Call
call.description: We will conduct a call to discuss key ideas, the content of the excursion, and the terms of cooperation

postingOnWebsite.title: Posting on the website
postingOnWebsite.description: We will create a description of the excursion that will attract the most attention from clients and publish the information on our website for maximum accessibility

howWeAreWorking.title: How do we work?

freePlacement.title: Placement of your offers on our website is free
freePlacement.description: We carefully select excursions, publishing only those that meet current demand

salesCommission.title: Commission from the sale of your excursions
salesCommission.description: We take a commission of 20% from the cost of each excursion order

howWeAreWorking.partnership: We invest money in promoting excursions, and you are responsible for conducting them

form.title: Select the country and city for your excursion and a contact phone number

previewTour.seeDown: See below what is included in the excursion

children.can: Children are allowed. (Children up to {maxAge, plural, 1= {# year} other {# years}} free)

emptyWishlist.title: Wishlist is empty
emptyWishlist.description: It seems you haven't added any tours yet
